caption.p: DPPH ( A), ABTS ( B) and FRAP ( C) scavenging activity of ethyl acetate and chloroform extracts, BHT and Ascorbic acid of G. A. Abbreviations: FRAP, ferric reducing antioxidant power; DPPH, 2,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl radical; ABTS, 2,2â€²-azino-bis (3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulphonic) acid; IC50, Concentration of sample providing 50% inhibition.
